name: Slippery Sammy
description:
Snow warning! The sidewalk is a bit slippery this afternoon (and full of rats, spiders and more), but Sammy is up for a long walk regardless. Slippery Sammy is an arcade game where you help Sammy walking on the slippery and full of rats, spiders, mailboxes and hydrants sidewalk - and, of course, full of items to increase your score!

> Main features:
- Retro-style graphics;
- Procedurally generated map;
- Random items to collect to increase your score;
- Three lives per run;
- Simple gameplay (only walk up and down the sidewalk);
- Progressively increasing difficulty;
- Hi-Score autosaving;
- Score leaderboard.
